name: Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
effect: Restores 8–10% of Max HP and an additional 800–1,200 HP to the selected character.
description: Grilled Fish doused in delicious sauce. The fish is scored, stuffed with spices, then baked. Once cooked, a thick mint sauce is generously drizzled over the top. The refreshing aroma of the fish is enough to whet anyone's appetite.

suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.
suspicious.description: Grilled Fish doused in a delicious sauce. The thick sauce has all but drowned out the fish's natural flavors, and the strident taste of mint has all but wiped that of Grilled Fish out.

normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.
normal.description: Grilled Fish doused in delicious sauce. The fish is scored, stuffed with spices, then baked. Once cooked, a thick mint sauce is generously drizzled over the top. The refreshing aroma of the fish is enough to whet anyone's appetite.

delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.
delicious.description: Grilled Fish doused in a delicious sauce. Crisp, fragrant fish skin, tender fish meat... Ordinary methods, extraordinary flavor.
